pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access and Analyze Data from the Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru // Provides access to and analysis of data from "The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru" (Len, B., Roque, J., Ulloa, C., Jorgensen, P.M., Pitman, N., Cano, A. 2006) doi:10.15381/rpb.v13i2.1782. This package offers comprehensive taxonomic, geographic, and conservation information about Peru's endemic plant species. It includes functions to verify species inclusion, obtain updated taxonomic details, and explore the dataset.
